title: Defines "criminal street gang" and prohibits criminal street gang recruitment of a minor
summary: Defines "criminal street gang" and prohibits criminal street gang recruitment of a minor.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          505

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  DIAZ  --  read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Codes

       AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation  to  the  crime  of  criminal
         street gang recruitment of a minor

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 460.10 of the penal law is amended by adding a  new
    2  subdivision 5 to read as follows:
    3    5. "CRIMINAL STREET GANG" MEANS ANY ONGOING ORGANIZATION, ASSOCIATION,
    4  OR GROUP OF THREE OR MORE PERSONS, WHETHER FORMAL OR INFORMAL, HAVING AS
    5  ONE  OF  ITS  PRIMARY  ACTIVITIES THE COMMISSION OF ONE OR MORE CRIMINAL
    6  ACTS, WHICH HAS AN IDENTIFIABLE NAME OR IDENTIFYING SIGN OR SYMBOL,  AND
    7  WHOSE  MEMBERS INDIVIDUALLY OR COLLECTIVELY ENGAGE IN OR HAVE ENGAGED IN
    8  CRIMINAL STREET GANG ACTIVITY.
    9    S 2. The penal law is amended by adding a new section 460.65  to  read
   10  as follows:
   11  S 460.65 CRIMINAL STREET GANG RECRUITMENT OF A MINOR.
   12    A PERSON IS GUILTY OF CRIMINAL STREET GANG RECRUITMENT OF A MINOR WHEN
   13  HE  OR SHE COERCES, SOLICITS, RECRUITS OR INDUCES A PERSON UNDER SIXTEEN
   14  YEARS OF AGE TO JOIN OR REMAIN A MEMBER OF A CRIMINAL  STREET  GANG,  OR
   15  CONSPIRES TO DO SO.
   16    CRIMINAL STREET GANG RECRUITMENT OF A MINOR IS A CLASS C FELONY.
   17    S 3. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
   18  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03322-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of criminal street gang recruitment of a minor
